title: Executive Order 5087-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to Indians of the Siletz Reservation, Oregon
content: It is hereby ordered under authority contained in Section Five of the Act of February 8, 1887 (24 Stat. L. 388-389), that the trust period on the allotments made to the Indians on the Siletz Reservation in Oregon, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1929, be, and is hereby extended for a period of ten years, with the exception of the following:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5087-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to Indians of the Siletz Reservation, Oregon Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/277271
